SELECT b.board_no,b.member_id,board_title,board_contents,m.member_nickname,b.board_likecnt,f.file_name FROM review_board b LEFT JOIN member m on b.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN file f on b.board_no = f.board_no WHERE TNF = 'T' AND b.board_no = f.board_no
AND b.board_title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND m.member_nickname LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, #{amount}

SELECT b.board_no, b.member_id, board_title, board_contents, m.member_nickname, b.board_likecnt, file_name FROM review_board b LEFT JOIN member m on b.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN file f on b.board_no = f.board_no WHERE TNF = 'T' AND b.board_no = f.board_no ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT 3
